name: campus-digital-failed
description: ERC Suite Challenge - Digital Campus Token Ecosystem

scripts.deploy:monad: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/TokenSuite-Simple.js --network monad
scripts.deploy:sepolia: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/TokenSuite-Simple.js --network sepolia
scripts.deploy:local: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/TokenSuite-Simple.js --network localhost
scripts.verify:ignition: npx hardhat ignition verify TokenSuiteModule --network monad
scripts.deploy-and-setup: npm run deploy:monad && npm run setup && npm run verify

author: BlockDevId Student
